column3: School of Life and Medical Science
column5: Why choose Herts?Flexible: This course is delivered online to fit in with your work, family, and lifestyle commitments.Industry Accreditation: We are accredited by the European Agency for Public Health Education Accreditation (APHEA). The course is delivered in line with public health practice guidance from the Faculty of Public Health.Employment Prospects: Graduates are currently working as doctors, pharmacists, nurses, and health professionals within the National Health Service improving their practitioner and management careers upon completion of this course.About the courseThe range of optional modules offered and the breadth of cases used across the programme will provide opportunities for specialism in the global and local context.
column7: UK Students Full time: £9600 for the 2022/2023 academic year Part time: £800 per 15 credits for the 2022/2023 academic year  EU/International Students Full time: £9600 for the 2022/2023 academic year Part time: £800 per 15 credits for the 2022/2023 academic year
column9: 1 year full time, 2-5 years part time
